title: Applying for an online degree
context: Ask an admissions counselor if the entire master's program is virtual.

content.bestLine: Is the entire master's program available online?

neutral.text: Can I complete the program online?
How much of the program is virtual?
Do you offer a fully online master's program?
Can I take all my classes online?
How does the online program work?

formal.text: Could you inform me about the online components of the program?
I would like to inquire about the virtual aspects of the master's program.
Is it possible to complete the program entirely through online coursework?
What percentage of the program can be completed online?
Are there any requirements that necessitate physical presence on campus?
I am interested in learning more about your online master's program.

patterns.meaning: Asking about the online nature of a program

lines.speaker: Applicant
lines.text: Hello, I'm interested in the master's program.

lines.speaker: Admissions Counselor
lines.text: Great, how can I assist you?

lines.speaker: Applicant
lines.text: Is the entire master's program available online?

lines.speaker: Admissions Counselor
lines.text: Yes, our program is fully online.

lines.speaker: Applicant
lines.text: That's great. Are there any on-campus requirements?

lines.speaker: Admissions Counselor
lines.text: No, the program is designed to be completed entirely online.

lines.speaker: Applicant
lines.text: How does the online program work?

lines.speaker: Admissions Counselor
lines.text: We use a learning management system for course materials and discussions.
